caption.title: Optimization of the polarized Raman signal collection geometry.
caption.p: Comparison between theoretical (red line) and experimental (blue circles) responses of the sum of Si modes versus wafer rotation angle Ïˆ plotted in polar coordinates for Si wafer with surface plane (111) for on-axis ( a) and off-axis ( b) polarized Raman scattering channels ( c), illustration of the incident/scattering polarization and signal collection geometries for a solution with nine polarized channels.
